eu.smartcampus.api

Interface DeviceConnectivityAPI.WriteListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    DeviceConnectivityAPI

    public static interface DeviceConnectivityAPI.WriteListener

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeAborted(DatapointAddress address, Value value, DeviceConnectivityAPI.ErrorType reason, int requestId)
      Notifies that a write operation was aborted.

    • Method Detail

      • writeAborted

        void writeAborted(DatapointAddress address,
                Value value,
                DeviceConnectivityAPI.ErrorType reason,
                int requestId)
        Notifies that a write operation was aborted.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the datapoint
        value - the value being written
        reason - the reason that caused the write operation to be aborted
        requestId - the id of the request

      • writeAcknowledge

        void writeAcknowledge(DatapointAddress address,
                    Value value,
                    DeviceConnectivityAPI.ConfirmationLevel confirmationLevel,
                    int requestId)
        Notifies that a value was written to the a datapoint.

        In some situations it may not possible to guarantee that the value was written. The device or protocol may not support acknowledging writing events. This is the case for example of X10 devices. If the datapoint can be read, implementers

        Parameters:
        address - the datapoint where the datapoint was written.
        value - the value that was written.
